problems.title: Sum of Two Numbers
problems.description:
Given two integers, return their sum.

Example:
Input: a = 5, b = 3
Output: 8

problems.title: Reverse String
problems.description:
Reverse the given string.

Example:
Input: hello
Output: olleh

problems.title: Check Palindrome
problems.description:
Check if a string is a palindrome.

Example:
Input: racecar
Output: true

problems.title: Find Maximum
problems.description:
Given an array of integers, find the maximum element.

Example:
Input: [1, 5, 3, 9, 2]
Output: 9

problems.title: Count Vowels
problems.description:
Count the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in a given string. Case insensitive.

Example:
Input: Hello World
Output: 3
